text: Sclerocroton is a plant genus of the family Euphorbiaceae first described as a genus in 1845.Hochstetter, Christian Ferdinand Friedrich. 1845. Flora 28: 85 in LatinTropicos, Sclerocroton Hochst. There a total of 6 known species in this genus; 5 species in continental Africa and a single species in Madagascar.Schmelzer, H.
